question: 喚起
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>scream</kanji> <kanji>wake up</kanji>! at someone you can bet they're going to <vocabulary>awaken</vocabulary>. Screaming anything at a sleeping person would probably <vocabulary>rouse</vocabulary> them. They'll probably be mad at you though.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
